name: Talisman (Not Jam)
description:
Made in <72 hours for Mini Jam 106, following the limitation "Limited Time".

Made in Godot // Art made in Blender and GIMP // Audio made using Reaper and Renoise

Audio samples taken from https://freesound.org // Images and textures from Unsplash and textures.com

To run on Mac, you may need to run the following command in the terminal in order to manually sign and notarise the application due to Apple's developer policies:

xattr -cr Type-Cast.app
